description:
Help thy neighbor

The people living in the Valley need your help. Improve your standing with NPCs  and unlock access to incredibly fun mini games. 

Tons of tasks

Enjoy yourself with a classic 2D space shooter, stack boxes in a familiar puzzle game, get yourself out of a giant maze and cut down some nasty weeds in a fiber cutting contest. You might even get a chance to do a dance off.
name: Tasks
